channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HADOOP-14568] GenericTestUtils#waitFor missing parameter verification
item.description: GenericTestUtils#waitFor missed the parameters verification. This will lead the method ran error or meanless. This point was suggested from this comment.

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.

comments.comment: Attach the initial patch. Adding the null checking and time validation checking.
Reupload patch to use Preconditions#checkArgument to check parameters.

Can you define the error strings as public static final in GTU, then use the same strings in your tests; guarantees consistent text. Also, you can use assertExceptionContains to validate exception string contents, or even use LambdaTestUtils.intercept() to execute the failing clause and validate the result
Thanks stevel@apache.org for the review. Attach the updated patch to address your comment.

-1 overall
